price: Аз Фиръавн, ки [роҳбари] саркаше дар зумраи исрофкорон буд
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
